hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

Interface RunnableClosableObserver<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type of the observer
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Observer<T>, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultObserver, DefaultRunnable, DefaultRunnableObserver

    public interface RunnableClosableObserver<T>
extends Runnable, Observer<T>, Closeable
    A combinational interface for a runnable, closable and an observer, i.e. an observer which has an attached scheduled counterpart and offers the option to close.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.02.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

      • Methods inherited from interface hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer

        error, finish, next

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close
